# UIScrollType.discrete

**Case**

A discrete scroll type that originates from a device like a mouse with a scroll wheel.

## Declaration

```swift
case discrete
```

## Constants

- **UIScrollType.continuous**: A continuous scroll type that originates from a device like a trackpad.

items.description: A continuous scroll type that originates from a device like a trackpad.
items.name: UIScrollType.continuous

title: UIScrollType.discrete
